channel.title: Tonypk please read or anyone else whon has experienced 508's
channel.description:
Hi and thanks for comming i need help on some errors i have on tony's TUT he had kindly posted a while back well i havent experienced 508's since i havent played 508's yet only 317. So lets get to the point
[u]This is the link to tony's TUT[/u] http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,327545.0.html
I will post the errors i am encounting while following this TUT
[b]This is the first thing i came across i couldnt understand[/b] [IMG]http://i438.photobucket.com/albums/qq110/Mason_013/help3.png[/img]
[b]This is the error i had found when following the instructions[/b] [IMG]http://i438.photobucket.com/albums/qq110/Mason_013/help2.png[/img]
[b]And this is also something i came across[/b] [IMG]http://i438.photobucket.com/albums/qq110/Mason_013/Help1.png[/img]
[tt]Now please if anyone experienced with 508's could you post me a small TUT on how to fix or follow these instructions[/tt]
PS. the thing i couldnt follow on the TUT is the part when you have to transfer the 508cache into some other file Also thanks for reading and try help out please :) BYE!

item.title: Tonypk please read or anyone else whon has experienced 508's

item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Dude that just ticks me off that he was banned anyway…
I cant seem to get the client/source to work as like it
still is above

Read full topic

item.title: Tonypk please read or anyone else whon has experienced 508's
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:7, topic:265841”]How he “DIE” i mean get banned? He was like as some say PWNAGE coder?[/quote]His reputation was taken for granted, overrated, arrogant, imo. He’s probably going to come and see this reply with my luck and bitch me out but whatever. It’s my complete honest opinion. He did get better a little bit before he left mscp, but his attitude never changed. He’s just another coder that isn’t an idiot is all.

Read full topic
